text:
The Board of Supervisors may amend this Chapter to ensure the protection of Private Information with a two-thirds vote. 
(Added by Proposition D, 11/7/2006)


 

Notes
*
> *Editor's note
     Proposition D, approved November 7, 2006, repealed former Ch. 12M, in its entirety, and enacted provisions designated as a new Ch. 12M to read as herein set out. Former Ch. 12M was entitled, "Nondisclosure of Private Information." 

 endnote table

heading.catch_text: AMENDMENT BY THE BOARD OF SUPERVISORS.
